title: Screen Magazine. No. 25. A New future for Somaliland

description: Shows the work of the United Nations Advisory Council which was sent to Somaliland to advise the Italian Trusteeship Administration there. Help has been given on the development of a democratic government and judicial system, establishment of medical services, organisation of education, and the development of agriculture and industry.
